Events that occurred on 16 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1913 – Norman Davis is born.
1973 – J.R.R. Tolkien takes a holiday to Bournemouth.
1977 - Singer Emilíana Torrini is born.
2004 - The Tolkien Society's Tolkien Weekend in Sarehole, Birmingham.
2007 - The Deluxe Edition of The Children of Húrin is published.
2010 - The Tolkien Society's Middle-earth Weekend in Sarehole, Birmingham.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events on this day.
